def test_receive_email():
    with socket.create_connection((SERVER, SERVER_POP3_PORT)) as server_socket:
        # Receive the server's welcome message
        welcome_msg = server_socket.recv(RECV_LENGTH)
        print(welcome_msg.decode())
        command = input('Enter your command: ')
        while command != 'OUT':
            server_socket.sendall(f'{command}\r\n'.encode(FORMAT))
            response = server_socket.recv(RECV_LENGTH)
            print(response.decode(FORMAT))

    toolbar_frame = tk.Frame(parent_frame, bg="white", bd=1, relief="solid")
    toolbar_frame.pack(side="top", fill="x")
    # Create buttons for the toolbar
    buttons = []
    button_names = ["File", "Edit", "View", "Insert", "Attach", "Format", "Options", "Tools", "Help"]
    for name in button_names:
        button = tk.Button(toolbar_frame, text=name, command=lambda n=name: button_toolbar_clicked(n), width=6, height=1)
        button.pack(side="left", padx=5, pady=5)
        buttons.append(button)
